details.title: Practical Course of Embedded Systems Based on XUPV2P Development Boards
details.abstract: This paper describes a lab course about embedded systems on field-programmable gate array. The proposed practices cover the main features of the design process, which include hardware architecture design, and embedded operating system configuration, adaptation, and implementation.
details.journal_title: IEEE Revista Iberoamericana de Tecnologias del Aprendizaje
